name: Clean my pink new beetle
description:
Owning a car is a great responsibility and can be lots of fun, and with this Clean My New Beetle cleaning game you can easily take on the challenge of cleaning your new pink beetle so it is ready for the open road. Here you can easily take charge and place the rubbish in the rubbish bin, pick off all your personal items including hat, bags, sunglasses, and more, before easily scrubbing the pieces of dirt and grime from your cars exterior! Once you have finished tidying it up you can then complete you car's appearance by giving it a quick and easy wash over to bring out its beautiful pink colored body. So if you want to own your very own car, why not take charge now with this Clean My New Beetle cleaning game today.

Features:
• CLEAN up game fun! Remove all the rubbish and throw it in the rubbish bin!
• PICK off any of your personal items to help clean your car to make it look tidy!
• SCRUB the dirt patches from your beetle using the scrubbing brush!
• CLEAN your new beetle by giving it a final wash down with clean water!
• WATCH your clean car shine in the sunlight ready for driving!
• ENJOY this beetle car cleaning game with your friends and family!
